name: Overview
data: [{"id":"df824224-a346-4e90-a6df-ef287441d8c2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Data Modeling & Value Propagation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"77e429f7-672d-4839-98ed-3fa10a8fcb10","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Data Modeling & Value Propagation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" group represents the \"Intelligence Layer\" of the Jarvis analysis engine. These modules are responsible for the complex task of tracking the life of data. Instead of just looking at the code's structure, they simulate the movement of values—identifying what every variable points to, how function returns are captured, and how data changes as it flows through different branches of logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a250092-0b4d-4392-8aaa-9f18eef9e0c2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group enables ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"points-to analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is the technical foundation required to detect sophisticated vulnerabilities like cross-site scripting (XSS), injection attacks, or logical data leaks.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5ddb937e-e6a6-4d16-aa7c-0cb97b8a3393","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2bbe2011-e36b-4963-b6ae-27c08c065630","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Included Modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f226a78-4e89-4c3d-8444-21e870640011","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"pointers.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab2bd519-3293-4d56-8da8-cc09af8e8d57","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Value Abstraction Layer","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This module defines \"Pointers,\" which represent the set of potential values a variable could hold. It handles the normalization of literal values (strings, integers) and the complex binding of arguments during function calls, ensuring that data passed from a caller correctly reaches the target function's parameters.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3276e105-878a-4b69-8dc8-9066768a2573","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"definitions.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6cc8673a-f748-4edf-9b29-12773d7d3813","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"State Memory","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This is the heart of the system's data model. It defines what a variable or function \"is\" and maintains a temporal history of its assignments via \"Points.\" It includes the logic for tracking how variables evolve line-by-line and provides a change management system to handle the \"what-if\" scenarios created by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"while","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" loops.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6766751a-c429-449b-8ff4-5e0a24bf47ef","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"returns.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d88693e5-52db-40b7-bffc-bcc788146c6b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Exit Tracker","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This module manages the crucial \"bridge\" between a function's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"return","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement and the variable in the calling scope that receives that value. It records where return values originate and ensures they propagate correctly across function boundaries, maintaining a continuous chain of data flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0533e0fa-34a0-4d60-aba3-91babaeb126d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b0fc84c1-4c85-43d5-918a-10a02edc8093","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group Purpose and flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fbb642fb-206c-49d5-83af-c46215d69c84","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These modules allow Jarvis to answer the most difficult question in static analysis: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"\"At this specific line, exactly what pieces of data could this variable possibly contain?\"","styles":{"italic":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4f12299d-16d4-470d-9782-73c998813192","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
